result.eng: I live in Cork now. - I live there as well!

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine

result.ga: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap

result.html: Ní mise a chum ná a cheapIt wasn't my idea.
result.ponchtml: Ní mise a ċum ná a ċeapIt wasn't my idea.

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.orig: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.html: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ponchtml: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an ṁaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.

result.eng: We are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ga: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.orig: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus mise
result.html: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nasctha tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.
result.ponchtml: Is ionann cás dúinn mar sin Táimid nascṫa tusa agus miseWe are in the same situation, then. We are connected, you and me.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: D'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith An mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ An mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: B'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: I was in hiding for a month.
result.ga: Bhí mise ar feadh míosa ar mo sheachnadh
result.orig: Bhí mise ar feadh míosa ar mo sheachnadh
result.html: Bhí mise ar feadh míosa ar mo sheachnadhI was in hiding for a month.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mise ar feaḋ míosa ar mo ẛeaċnaḋI was in hiding for a month.
